html: 11.7.17  10:02 pm   AAG FUCKING KILL ME. Whats the one thing I think my music teacher told everyone to do. DON"T BRING HOME YOUR MUSIC BINDER. what did I do. BRING HOME THE FUCKING MUSIC BINDER. what's the one thing my sister told me to do COMPLETE THE I/O DIAGRAM FOR THE PROJECT THAT WAS DUE BEFORE. what did I do. NOT THAT. what did I tell myself before school started. TRY YOUR BEST AT EVERYTHING. what did I do. NOT THAT. But I still don't want to try my best at homework. But I still want to get it done. But I can't cause I'm not doing that, like I also want.  The thing I'm most upset about is the binder. It inconvenienced my teacher, and was caused by me just being forgetful.

11.7.17  12:25 am   So recently I drew a picture of a plant being stabbed into a table and bleeding over the edge. It's symbolic for something i've been thinking about lately (#deep, I know). It's pretty wild looking and you'd think it was a hallucination or a fever dream or something meaningless. But it's actually just a metaphor. I could explain it pretty easily... but if I didn't, nobody would ever know what it meant.
Anyway, what I'm saying is: you don't ever really explain why you do what you do in regards to your music,
